query: I've been feeling really down lately and I don't know what to do. How can I cope with depression?
I get extremely anxious before exams and presentations. What techniques can help me manage this anxiety?
I lost someone close to me recently. How do I deal with grief and move forward?
My partner and I keep arguing about small things. How can we improve our communication?
I constantly feel like I'm not good enough. How can I build my self-confidence?
Work has been overwhelming and I can't seem to relax. What are some effective stress relief methods?
I feel very uncomfortable in social situations and avoid gatherings. How can I overcome this?
My parents don't understand me and we constantly clash. How can I improve my relationship with them?
I experienced something traumatic and it keeps affecting my daily life. Where should I start healing?
I get angry very easily and sometimes I say things I regret. How can I control my anger better?
I feel lonely even when I'm around people. How can I form meaningful connections?
I'm extremely hard on myself and nothing I do feels good enough. Is this perfectionism hurting me?
I can't sleep at night because my mind races with worries. How can I improve my sleep?
I'm confused about who I am and what I want in life. How do I find my identity?
I think I might have a drinking problem but I'm not sure how to stop. What should I do?
I sometimes have sudden panic attacks where I can't breathe. How can I handle these episodes?
I hate how I look and it affects my confidence. How can I improve my body image?
I've lost all motivation to do anything, even things I used to enjoy. How can I get it back?
I have trouble saying no to people and end up feeling drained. How do I set better boundaries?
Someone hurt me badly and I can't let go of the resentment. Should I forgive them?
I feel stuck in my career and don't know what direction to take. This uncertainty stresses me out.
I've been betrayed before and now I have trouble trusting anyone. How can I rebuild trust?
I constantly compare myself to others on social media and feel inadequate. How do I stop?
I feel guilty about things I've done in the past and can't move on. How do I cope with guilt?
I'm completely burned out from work and personal responsibilities. How can I recover?
